name: Previously in Walking DeD
description:
RiseOf GAMES is a part of "RiseOf" Youtube channel.
We produce now prototypes of many kind of games to enhance our programing level and recruit few enthousiasts indie game creators to build full fun games together (ARPG, Shmup, RTS, RPG, Hack'n'Slash, whatever!)

We build our prototypes in 1 week max.

Already done: 

-RiseOf Gems

- Previously in Walking Dead

- Currently : a Shmup
